concept.title: Oil pressure gauge
concept.shortdesc: The oil pressure gauge indicates the oil pressure in the engine.

conbody.p: The oil pressure gauge is located to the right of the speedometer.
This reads approximately 60 lbs/sq in. (4.22kg/cm2) under normal running conditions.
There is an oil pressure warning light.
